mapping_info.target_framework: FDA Digital Health Guidance & Medical Device Regulations
mapping_info.scope: AI/ML-enabled medical devices, SaMD, digital health tools

mappings.haaisvs_description: Three-factor risk assessment (clinical function, autonomy, data sensitivity)
mappings.notes: FDA requires risk assessment for medical device classification - HAAISVS three-factor approach directly supports FDA Class determination
mappings.compliance_evidence: Risk assessment documentation showing clinical function analysis, autonomy level classification, and data sensitivity evaluation

mappings.haaisvs_description: FDA-style PCCP implementation for high-risk AI agents
mappings.notes: Direct implementation of FDA PCCP requirements for AI/ML medical devices
mappings.compliance_evidence: PCCP documentation including modification types, validation protocols, performance criteria, and change control procedures

mappings.notes: Supports FDA post-market surveillance and real-world performance monitoring requirements
mappings.compliance_evidence: Clinical performance monitoring plan, statistical analysis protocols, and performance degradation alert systems

mappings.haaisvs_description: Health Canada SGBA+ documentation and bias assessment
mappings.notes: FDA diversity requirements less comprehensive than Health Canada SGBA+ but HAAISVS addresses both
mappings.compliance_evidence: Demographic diversity analysis, bias assessment documentation, and mitigation strategies

mappings.haaisvs_description: Explainable AI with clinically meaningful insights
mappings.notes: FDA design controls require understanding of software function - XAI supports clinical validation requirements
mappings.compliance_evidence: XAI implementation documentation, clinical validation of explanations, healthcare professional usability testing

mappings.notes: FDA cybersecurity guidance covers general threats - HAAISVS adds AI-specific adversarial testing
mappings.compliance_evidence: Adversarial testing protocols, robustness validation results, and threat model documentation

mappings.haaisvs_description: Clinical accountability frameworks for healthcare professionals
mappings.notes: FDA human factors requirements directly supported by HAAISVS clinical accountability frameworks
mappings.compliance_evidence: Clinical oversight procedures, healthcare professional competency requirements, and accountability documentation

510k_clearance.notes: Standard 510(k) pathway supported by Level 2 HAAISVS requirements

de_novo_classification.notes: Novel device classification requires comprehensive Level 3 verification

pma_approval.notes: PMA pathway requires highest level of evidence and verification

required_documentation: PCCP documentation with change control procedures
XAI validation and clinical usability evidence
Human factors validation and clinical oversight procedures
